00025 #ifndef MULECOLOR_H
00026 #define MULECOLOR_H
00027 
00028 #include <wx/colour.h>
00029 #include <wx/settings.h>
00030 #include "Types.h"
00031 
00032 class wxPen;
00033 class wxBrush;
00034 
00035 class CMuleColour 
00036 {
00037 public:
00038 
00039     enum ColourComponent { COLOUR_R = 1, COLOUR_G = 2, COLOUR_B = 4 };
00040 
00041     CMuleColour() { Init(); Set(0,0,0); }   
00042     CMuleColour(const wxColour& colour) { Init(); Set(colour.Red(), colour.Green(), colour.Blue()); }
00043     CMuleColour(byte r, byte g, byte b) { Init(); Set(r,g,b); }
00044     CMuleColour(unsigned long rgb)
00045     { 
00046         Init();
00047         Set((rgb & 0xFF), (rgb >> 8) & 0xFF, (rgb >> 16) & 0xFF);
00048     }
00049     
00050     CMuleColour(wxSystemColour colour)
00051     {
00052         Init();
00053         const wxColour& wxcolour = wxSystemSettings::GetColour(colour);
00054         Set(wxcolour.Red(), wxcolour.Green(), wxcolour.Blue());
00055     }
00056 
00057     void Init() {
00058         m_cachedpen = NULL;
00059         m_cachedbrush = NULL;
00060     }
00061     
00062     ~CMuleColour() { }
00063     
00064     void Set(byte red, byte green, byte blue) { m_red = red; m_green = green; m_blue = blue; }
00065     
00066     inline byte Red() const { return m_red; }
00067     inline byte Green() const { return m_green; }
00068     inline byte Blue() const { return m_blue; }
00069     
00070     const CMuleColour& Blend(byte percentage, ColourComponent flags = (ColourComponent)(COLOUR_R | COLOUR_G | COLOUR_B) )
00071     {
00072         unsigned int red = (unsigned int)(Red() * ((flags & COLOUR_R) ? ((float)percentage/(float)100) : (float)1));
00073         unsigned int green = (unsigned int)(Green() * ((flags & COLOUR_G) ? ((float)percentage/(float)100) : (float)1));
00074         unsigned int blue = (unsigned int)(Blue() * ((flags & COLOUR_B) ? ((float)percentage/(float)100) : (float)1));
00075         Set((red < 255) ? red : 255, (green < 255) ? green : 255, (blue < 255) ? blue : 255);
00076         return *this;
00077     }
00078     
00079     const CMuleColour& BlendWith(const CMuleColour& colour, double covered)
00080     {
00081         unsigned int red = (unsigned int)(Red() + (colour.Red() * covered) + 0.5);
00082         unsigned int green = (unsigned int)(Green() + (colour.Green() * covered) + 0.5);
00083         unsigned int blue = (unsigned int)(Blue() + (colour.Blue() * covered) + 0.5);
00084         Set((red < 255) ? red : 255, (green < 255) ? green : 255, (blue < 255) ? blue : 255);
00085         return *this;
00086     }
00087     
00088     unsigned long GetULong() const { return (Blue() << 16) | (Green() << 8) | Red(); }
00089         
00090     bool IsBlack() const { return !Red() && !Blue() && !Green(); }
00091     
00092     bool IsSameAs(const CMuleColour& colour) const { return (Red() == colour.Red()) && (Green() == colour.Green()) && (Blue() == colour.Blue()); }
00093     
00094     operator wxColour() const {
00095         return wxColor(m_red, m_green, m_blue);
00096     }
00097     
00098     const wxPen& GetPen(int width = 1, int style = wxSOLID) const;
00099     const wxBrush& GetBrush(int style = wxSOLID) const;
00100     
00101 private:
00102     byte m_red;
00103     byte m_green;
00104     byte m_blue;
00105 
00106     mutable wxPen* m_cachedpen;
00107     mutable wxBrush* m_cachedbrush;
00108 };
00109 
00110 #endif
